analysis.key_quote: I oppose this proposed rule in its entirety, and every section of the proposed rule, as it allows any given Administration to replace the nation's professional policy experts who serve the Constitution and - importantly - the American people across Administrations with individuals who subordinate their duty to the law to partisan and financial loyalties.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule and raises concerns about politicization and the integrity of the civil service, emphasizing the need for protections against partisan influences.
